Surveillance trends of Campylobacter

Surveillance trends of Campylobacter is a special segment with talks and discussion with delegates from public health agencies from around the world. These include:

  • UK, PHE - Dr. Frieda Jorgensen
  • CANADA, PHAC & Canadian Integrated Program for Antimicrobial Resistance Surveillance - Dr Anne Deckert
  • USA, FSIS - Peter Evans/Mustafa Simmons
  • Japan, National Institute of Infectious Diseases (NIID); Tokyo - Dr. Koji Yahara

4:45 - 5:00 Q&A (Theme: what research is needed to push surveillance forward

Timings for individual programme items are specified as an offset from when the session begins.

See Registration session for information on how to connect.

frontmatter.title: Session 3 - Trends in Campylobacter epidemiology and public health
